column17:
Product Description

Organic Surge tropical bergamot hand and nail cream has an intensive moisturising action and is quickly absorbed to provide comfort and hydration. It works to prevent moisture loss to leave hands softened and rejuvenated. It intensively moisturises and nourishes. It naturally conditions your skin combats dryness and irritation. It is suitable for all skin types and free from animal derived ingredients. Available in 75ml.
